mapper.insert: insert into IncludeSportRental(event_id,sport_event_id) values((select max(ev.event_id) from Rental ev),#{sportRentalId})

insert into IncludeSportRental(event_id,sport_event_id) values((select auto_increment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = 'Rental'),#{sportRentalId})
mapper.select: select distinct reservation_id from EquipmentReservations er left join Equipments eq on er.equipment_id = eq.equipment_id left join Owners ow on eq.owner_id = ow.owner_id where er.start_date = #{today} and ow.counter_id = #{counterId} and er.renter_id = #{renterId}

select reservation_id as reservationId , equipment_id as equipmentId , equipment_n as equipmentN , event_id as eventId , renter_id as renterId , start_date as startDate , end_date as endDate , usage_date as usageDate , comment as comment from EquipmentReservations where reservation_id = #{reservationId}

select se.sport_event_id as sportRentalId , se.name as name , se.comment as comment from SportRental as se left join IncludeSportRental as ise on se.sport_event_id = ise.sport_event_id where ise.event_id = #{event_id}
